data.name: Goddess Husk II
data.detailed_description:
Wishlist Goddess Husk II

Wishlist Now...



The more wishlists the game receives up until release, the bigger the Steam Launch discount.

Add Goddess Husk II to your Steam wishlist now!


About the Game

Story



Goddess Husk II returns with a new chapter in the macrophilia based turn RPG series featuring stunning pre-rendered backdrops, vicious foes and of course the all powerful, beautiful Goddesses.
The last of her kind, the final Awaker begins her journey in a realm crumbled by a new blight, turning all beasts and mortal into rage induced killing machines.
With the aid of a only a chosen few survivors, she must not only rouse the fabled Goddesses but become one herself in order to truly restore peace to the realm.

Content



Experience the dual fate of the Awaker, lowly mortal underdog striving against fearsome adversaries to dominant amazon giantess who is free to decimate and destroy anything in her path at will.

Gameplay



Explore the broken realm of Ytheria however you wish. Many paths lay open from the start and each road will lead to new challenges but all to either glory or doom if you set out unprepared. Foes will hunt you down or fear you depending on the Awaker's state at the time.

Features



  • Turn based combat utilising QTE is back, with a simplified and more fluid engine to allow for smoother and more realistic battles.

  • Animated character and enemy sprites will feature in battle scenes, a first for the series.

  • Gorgeously rendered backgrounds providing a deep sense of foreboding and atmosphere.

  • Assume the role of both mortal and Goddess, each with differing scenarios and playstyles.

  • Semi-open world exploration that provides typically 10-20 hours of gameplay with many secrets to uncover.

  • Size fetish elements feature throughout such as femdom, sizedom, footplay, breast crushing, ass crushing, vore, muscle worship and much more!

data.short_description: The Goddess returns... A new threat has decimated the realm of mortals and the final Awaker is roused from her aeons long slumber. Become the saviour... become the Goddess!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 or better Display
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: VRAM 4GB or better

content_descriptors.notes:
Adults 18+ only.
Contains fetish elements, nudity and scenes of a sexual nature and also visual sex acts throughout.
Parts of the game may be considered violent or cruel.
